6.16.17  12:48 pm   I noticed that you get a lot of repeated questions about "why don't you put ads on your videos" and "where are the videos, why do your videos take so long?" You don't seem to like those types of questions very much so I would suggest making an FAQ at the very top of the ueqstions page with those questions on it so hopefully you don't have to deal with those questions any longer. What do you think?
6.16.17  12:25 pm   have you found out the meaning of 'yicyig noop skytha kacdu ufoi fupes yahej i dug tyts eoches frozum prery?' yet?

6.16.17  12:13 pm   do you think it is possible to learn how to play a drum kit with little to no access to one? I've been a percussionist for years (marching band snare, djembe in church, etc.) but can't drum on an actual drum where i live. i desperately want to expand my abilities so I can just sit down at a set and play without feeling totally lost. i know i need a lot more limb independence and just straight up muscle memory to do that.... do you think it's possible to develop those any other way?

6.11.17  8:50 pm   You seem like a smart person that manages to mix inspiration, music, humor, and randomness in your works, and I love that. Like, it make me think "wow, when I grow up, I want to be him". So after this kinda lengthy introduction, here's my question: Why do you make your works so short? It kinda makes me sad, because it feels like you have so much potential, with all the music you make n' stuff, demonstrated in History of Japan and hotewig

     

5.20.17  2:22 pm  So why are all your other videos so...short?

     

5.19.17  1:40 pm   I've been wondering, why are some of your videos only 8 seconds long?

     

4.14.17  10:40 pm   Is there a reason why you did so many really short videos ? I really love them and hope to see more when you are done with this golgotha

     

3.16.17  9:53 pm   I love ur video, but why do they so short?

     

     starting with short projects is a good way to get started if you are feeling overwhelmed with the possibilities. i did that for a while, and then just when i was ready to move on, i accidentally got really popular on a video site that has a maximum time length of 6 and a half seconds, so i had to make even more short ones
